name: The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff
name_original: The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff
description:
The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff is a game developed by Electronic Arts Redwood Shores. It came out on 15-04-2008. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff on PC.
